description: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 2 PM EST on 14th December, 2022. All bids submitted after 2 PM EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.",
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement
## Government of Canada Tender Notice
**Notice Title:** 
F3065-221875 - Sea Water Valves
**Bid Submission Deadline:** December 14th, 2022, 2:00 PM EST

## Tender Details
* **Procurement Number:** WS3754638555
* **Contracting Authority:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Project Place of Performance:** Québec, QC, Canada

## Background
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of Fisheries and Oceans Canada – Canadian Coast Guard, invites contractors to submit bids for the acquisition of six (6) sea water valves, inclusive of delivery, to be installed in Québec City, QC, Canada, as outlined in Annex A of this Request for Proposal.

## Eligibility Requirements
All contract bidders must be:
	+ Authorized to conduct business in Canada
	+ Registered in the Vendor of Record (VoR) database
	+ Accredited to the applicable freeze code

## Procurement Method
The bidding process will follow a competitive and open bidding method.

## Selection Criteria
Sealed bids will be accepted from eligible contractors. The contract will be awarded to the bidder offering the lowest price, which meets all the requirements and specifications outlined in this Request for Proposal.

## Notice URL 
* http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14729350?extsite=MTQ3MjkzNTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

## Regulations and Inquiries
* For further information about this tender, contact the PSPC Contracting Authority:
	+ Name: Oscar Delgado Garcia
	+ Email: [oscar.delgadogarcia@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:oscar.delgadogarcia@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) 

Notes:

* The RFP is available on the Ariba discovery website.
* proposer must register with PWGSC to participate.
* Seas water valves are required. 

The notice of termination is on page 9 of attachment to this document.
